imagine.description: Generate AI images using Animagine XL 4.0 diffusion model. Supports anime-style prompts with quality tags like masterpiece, high score, absurdres.
imagine.example: .imagine 1girl, blue archive, long hair, masterpiece, absurdres

vision.description: Analyze images using Google Gemini 2.0 vision AI. Detects images from attachments, replies, or URLs and provides detailed analysis.

google.description: Search Google and get top 5 results with titles, snippets, and links.

image.description: Search for images on Google and browse results.

youtube.description: Search YouTube videos with interactive pagination and video previews.

art.description: Search anime/manga art from 6 sources: Danbooru, Gelbooru, Safebooru, Konachan, Yande.re, and Rule34 (NSFW only). Save favorites to folders, organized in MongoDB. NSFW mode auto-activates in NSFW channels.

art source.description: Search a specific art source (danbooru, gelbooru, safebooru, konachan, yandere, rule34).

art save.description: Save art to your favorites with optional folder organization. Art stored in MongoDB.

art folder.description: Manage art folders - create, delete, list, and organize your saved art collections.

art favorites.description: View your saved favorite art organized by folders. Browse your personal collection.

translate.description: Translate text to another language. Supports 50+ languages including Japanese, Spanish, French, German, Chinese.

weather.description: Get current weather and forecast for any location worldwide.

define.description: Look up word definitions, pronunciations, and examples from the dictionary.

urban.description: Look up slang and internet terms on Urban Dictionary with examples and votes.

wiki.description: Search Wikipedia articles with summaries and links to full articles.

color.description: Designer's color toolkit! Analyze colors, get role/user colors, extract from images, generate palettes, and check WCAG accessibility.

color random.description: Generate a random color for design inspiration with full color analysis.

color role.description: Get detailed color information from any role in your server.

color user.description: Get the display color from a user's top colored role.

color palette.description: Generate a color harmony palette with complementary, analogous, triadic colors, shades and tints.

color contrast.description: Check WCAG accessibility contrast ratio between two colors. Shows AA/AAA compliance.

color preview.description: Preview how a color looks on UI elements with CSS/Tailwind/Discord code snippets.

color image.description: Extract dominant colors from an attached image. Great for creating palettes from photos!

qr.description: Generate a QR code from text or URL. Share links, WiFi passwords, or any text instantly!

screenshot.description: Take a screenshot of any website. Preview pages without leaving Discord!

shorten.description: Shorten long URLs using TinyURL. Perfect for sharing links in chat!

calc.description: Calculate math expressions safely. Supports +, -, *, /, **, % operations.

anime.description: Anime command group. Use subcommands: search, character, recommend, quote, schedule, trivia.

anime search.description: Search MyAnimeList for anime titles. Shows synopsis, ratings, episodes, studios, and genres with interactive navigation.

anime character.description: Look up anime characters from MyAnimeList. Shows profiles, images, series appearances, and voice actors.

anime recommend.description: Get random anime recommendations with full details including ratings, genres, and synopsis.

anime quote.description: Get random anime quotes from popular series with character and anime information.

anime schedule.description: View anime airing schedule for any day of the week. Shows currently airing anime with episode counts and scores.

anime trivia.description: Play anime trivia! Guess which anime a character is from. 30 seconds to answer.

manga.description: Manga command group. Use subcommands: search, read, recommend.

manga search.description: Search MangaDex for manga titles. Shows chapters, authors, status, and detailed series information.

manga read.description: Read manga directly in Discord through MangaDex. Navigate chapters with interactive controls.

manga recommend.description: Get random manga recommendations with complete series details and reading stats.

waifu.description: Get random waifu images. Supports categories: waifu, neko, shinobu, megumin, and more reaction types.

husbando.description: Get random husbando images with artist credits.

neko.description: Get random neko (cat girl) images with artist credits.

kitsune.description: Get random kitsune (fox girl) images with artist credits.

anime wallpaper.description: Get random anime wallpapers with artist credits and download button.

topanime.description: Get top anime lists by popularity, airing status, upcoming, or favorites.

wallpaper.description: Get random anime wallpapers with artist credits and download links.

game.description: Anya's Game Corner! View all available mini-games organized by category. Shows your balance and character bonuses.

game pokemon.description: Draw a random Pokémon card for 100 stella points. Gacha-style rarity system with multiplied rewards!

game anime.description: Draw a random anime character card for 100 stella points. Features characters from various anime!

slots.description: Spin the slot machine! Match symbols to win. Three-of-a-kind = jackpot with symbol multiplier!

coinflip.description: Flip a coin! Call heads or tails to double your bet. Simple 50/50 gambling.

guess.description: Guess a number 1-100 in 5 attempts! Closer guesses win more. Perfect guess = 10x bet!

hangman.description: Play hangman! Guess letters to reveal the word. Win points based on word length and mistakes.

wordle.description: Play Wordle! Guess the 5-letter word in 6 tries. Green = correct, Yellow = wrong position.

work.description: Do honest work for guaranteed stella points. 30-minute cooldown. Character bonuses apply!

job.description: Take on a risky mission for bigger rewards. May fail! 1-hour cooldown. Character-specific missions.

rob.description: Attempt to steal stella points from another user. High risk - you may get fined if caught!

claim.description: Claim your daily stella points reward! Streak bonuses increase rewards up to 30 days.

8ball.description: Ask the magic 8-ball a question and receive a mystical yes/no/maybe answer.

memo.description: Memory game - an emoji appears for 2 seconds, then you must react with the correct one. 15 second timeout.

qna.description: Set up Q&A channels for your server. Creates question and answer channels with interactive buttons. Requires Manage Channels.

riddle.description: Riddle system for your server. Use subcommands to setup and post riddles.

riddle setup.description: Configure the riddle answer collection channel. Required before posting riddles. Requires Administrator.

riddle post.description: Post a riddle through a modal interface. Opens dialog for question and answer input.

Action Commands.description:
Roleplay action commands! Use these with @user or 'everyone'.

Available: `.pat`, `.hug`, `.kiss`, `.cuddle`, `.bite`, `.lick`, `.slap`, `.cry`, `.wave`, `.smug`, `.dance`, `.happy`

mod.description: Moderation command group. Configure mod log, mute role, and view cases.

mod log.description: Set or view the moderation log channel. All mod actions will be logged here. Requires Manage Server.

mod muterole.description: Set the mute role for the server. This role will be assigned when using the mute command. Requires Manage Server.

mod cases.description: View moderation case history for a user. Shows all warnings, bans, kicks, timeouts, and mutes.

warn.description: Warn a user with a reason. Warnings are logged and can be viewed later. Requires Kick Members.

warn list.description: List all warnings for a user with warning IDs and reasons.

warn clear.description: Clear all warnings for a user. Requires confirmation. Requires Kick Members.

warn remove.description: Remove a specific warning by ID. Requires Kick Members.

kick.description: Kick a user from the server with an optional reason. Requires Kick Members.

ban.description: Ban a user from the server with an optional reason and message deletion period. Requires Ban Members.

unban.description: Unban a user from the server by their user ID. Requires Ban Members.

softban.description: Softban a user (ban then immediately unban) to delete their recent messages. Requires Ban Members.

timeout.description: Timeout a user for a specified duration (e.g., 10m, 1h, 1d). Requires Moderate Members.

untimeout.description: Remove timeout from a user, allowing them to send messages again. Requires Moderate Members.

mute.description: Mute a user by assigning the mute role. Use .mod muterole to set the role first. Requires Moderate Members.

unmute.description: Unmute a user by removing the mute role. Requires Moderate Members.

purge.description: Bulk delete messages from a channel. Supports various filters. Requires Manage Messages.

purge user.description: Delete messages from a specific user in the channel. Requires Manage Messages.

purge bots.description: Delete all bot messages from the channel. Requires Manage Messages.

purge embeds.description: Delete all messages containing embeds. Requires Manage Messages.

purge images.description: Delete all messages containing images or attachments. Requires Manage Messages.

purge contains.description: Delete messages containing specific text. Requires Manage Messages.

slowmode.description: Set channel slowmode delay (0-21600 seconds). 0 to disable. Requires Manage Channels.

lock.description: Lock a channel to prevent @everyone from sending messages. Requires Manage Channels.

unlock.description: Unlock a previously locked channel. Requires Manage Channels.

nuke.description: Delete and recreate a channel, removing all messages. Requires confirmation. Requires Manage Channels.

role add.description: Add a role to a user or multiple users. Requires Manage Roles.

role remove.description: Remove a role from a user or multiple users. Requires Manage Roles.

role all.description: Add a role to all members in the server. Requires confirmation. Requires Manage Roles.

role bots.description: Add a role to all bots in the server. Requires Manage Roles.

role humans.description: Add a role to all human members in the server. Requires Manage Roles.

role removeall.description: Remove a role from all members who have it. Requires confirmation. Requires Manage Roles.

notes.description: Moderator notes system. Add, view, and manage notes about users.

pokedex.description: Look up Pokémon info from PokeAPI - stats, types, abilities, evolutions, and artwork. Supports shiny and regional forms.

pt.description: Pokétwo helper commands. Manage collections, shiny hunts, type pings, and quest pings.

pt help.description: Shows help for all Pokétwo commands including collection, shiny hunt, and ping features.

pt config.description: View server configuration for Pokétwo features. Requires Manage Server.

pt config protection.description: Configure shiny and collection protection channels. Requires Manage Server.

pt tp.description: Type Ping - Select Pokémon types (Fire, Water, Electric, etc.) to get pinged when they spawn.

pt qp.description: Quest Ping - Select regions (Kanto, Johto, Hoenn, etc.) to get pinged for quest spawns.

pt shiny.description:
Set your shiny hunt target. Get pinged when it spawns! One target at a time.

`.pt sh <pokemon>` → Set target
`.pt sh` → View current
`.pt sh remove` → Remove

pt collection.description:
Manage your collection watchlist (max 50). Get pinged when any spawn!

`.pt cl add <pokemon>` → Add
`.pt cl remove <pokemon>` → Remove
`.pt cl` → View
`.pt cl clear` → Clear all

quest.description: Main quest command group. View active quests, manage settings, and interact with characters.

quest roles.description: Configure roles that can be randomly assigned to targets. Requires Manage Roles or Anya Manager.

quest leaderboard.description: Show the stella points leaderboard for the server. Displays top earners with cards, reviews, and quest completion stats in a premium 3D image. Also available as standalone `.leaderboard` command.

quest character.description: View your active character with HP, stats, and feeding status. Part of the quest reward system.

character.description: View your active character (shortcut). Shows character info, HP bar, and inventory options.

cook.description: Cook meals using your characters as chefs. Play timing mini-game for quality results.

redirect.description: Set channels for quest mission redirects. Requires Manage Channels or Anya Manager role.

profile.description: View your quest profile with level, XP, stella points, and server rank.

inventory.description: View your quest inventory with items, meals, and characters organized by category.

balance.description: Check your stella points balance and server leaderboard position.

shop.description: Browse and purchase items, characters, and recipes from the quest shop.

leaderboard.description: Show the stella points leaderboard with a stunning 3D visual. Displays top earners with their cards, reviews, and quest completion stats in a premium image.

reviews.description: Review system for rating server members. View, add, edit, or remove reviews.

reviews leaderboard.description: Show the reviews leaderboard - members ranked by their review scores and count.

info.description: Information commands hub - shows all available info commands organized by category.

user.description: Get detailed user profile: ID, status, badges, roles, account age, join date, activity, and boosting status.

avatar.description: Get a user's avatar in full resolution with download button. Shows both server and global avatars.

banner.description: Get a user's profile banner in full resolution with download link.

server.description: Comprehensive server overview with member count, boost level, channels, roles, and creation date.

server icon.description: Get the server's icon in full resolution with download button.

server banner.description: Get the server's banner in full resolution with download button.

members.description: Detailed member statistics: total count, humans vs bots, and status breakdown (online/idle/dnd/offline).

channel.description: Channel information: ID, type, position, category, NSFW status, slowmode, topic, or voice settings.

role.description: Role details: ID, color, position, member count, permissions, mentionable/hoisted status.

roles.description: View a user's roles organized by type (highest, managed, other). Supports lookup and member modes.

emojis.description: List all server emojis with counts for static and animated, plus usage limits.

emoji.description: Get detailed info about a specific emoji: ID, name, animated status, creation date, and download link.

botinfo.description: Bot statistics: server count, user count, latency, Python/Discord.py versions, and creation date.

ping.description: Check bot latency with color-coded status (green=excellent, yellow=good, red=poor).

permissions.description: View permissions for a user or role with categorized breakdown.

invite.description: Get or create server invite links. Can also inspect existing invite links.

activity.description: Discover what members are playing, streaming, listening to, or watching. Find players for specific games.

uptime.description: Display how long the bot has been running.

memory.description: Show current bot memory usage for performance monitoring.

credit.description: Show bot credits and developer information.

ticket.description: Support ticket system. Create and manage tickets in your server.

ticket create.description: Create a new support ticket panel in a specified channel.

ticket activate.description: Activate the ticket system for your server.

ticket edit.description: Edit an existing ticket panel message.
